introduction.description: I am a photographer and I am married to Mette Marie. Our daughter is named Meta Mei and she goes to school. We live in Copenhagen and work with art and photography. And we love

about.title: Sådan skal du bo
about.description: Normally we have self check-in, but sometimes we will be there to meet and greet you. There is a keygarage at the left side of the front door, you will get the code a few days before arrival.
